Deprecated API

  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.mongodb.morphia.logging.Logr
    Use Logger directly
    org.mongodb.morphia.logging.LogrFactory
    Use LoggerFactory directly
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.mongodb.morphia.DAO
    use org.mongodb.morphia.dao.BasicDAO
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.mongodb.morphia.dao.BasicDAO.ds
    please use the getter for this field
    org.mongodb.morphia.dao.BasicDAO.entityClazz
    please use the getter for this field
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.mongodb.morphia.DatastoreImpl.getId(Object)
    org.mongodb.morphia.DatastoreImpl.getKey(T)
    org.mongodb.morphia.converters.TypeConverter.getSupportTypes()
    use #getSupportedTypes()
    org.mongodb.morphia.utils.ReflectionUtils.getTypeArgumentOfParameterizedClass(Field, int, int)
    this class is unused in morphia and will be removed in a future release
    org.mongodb.morphia.utils.ReflectionUtils.getTypeArguments(Class, Class)
    this class is unused in morphia and will be removed in a future release
    org.mongodb.morphia.utils.ReflectionUtils.isFieldParameterizedWithClass(Field, Class)
    this class is unused in morphia and will be removed in a future release
    org.mongodb.morphia.utils.ReflectionUtils.isFieldParameterizedWithPropertyType(Field)
    this class is unused in morphia and will be removed in a future release
    org.mongodb.morphia.MapreduceResults.isOk()
    org.mongodb.morphia.query.Query.queryNonPrimary()
    use #useReadPreference(ReadPreference) instead
    org.mongodb.morphia.query.Query.queryPrimaryOnly()
    use #useReadPreference(ReadPreference)
    org.mongodb.morphia.converters.TypeConverter.setSupportTypes(Class[])
    use #setSupportedTypes(Class[])
    org.mongodb.morphia.aggregation.GeoNear.GeoNearBuilder.setUniqueDocuments(Boolean)
    Deprecated since server version 2.6: Geospatial queries no longer return duplicate results. The $uniqueDocs operator has no impact on results.
    org.mongodb.morphia.mapping.validation.MappingValidator.validate(MappedClass)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.mongodb.morphia.mapping.Mapper(DatastoreProvider)
    Use Mapper#setDatastoreProvider(DatastoreProvider) instead
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    org.mongodb.morphia.query.FilterOperator.WITHIN
    New in server version 2.4: $geoWithin replaces $within which is deprecated.
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements 
    Annotation Type Element and Description
    org.mongodb.morphia.annotations.Index.background
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    org.mongodb.morphia.annotations.Reference.concreteClass
    unimplemented
    org.mongodb.morphia.annotations.Index.disableValidation
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    org.mongodb.morphia.annotations.Index.dropDups
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    org.mongodb.morphia.annotations.Index.expireAfterSeconds
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    org.mongodb.morphia.annotations.Index.name
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    org.mongodb.morphia.annotations.Index.sparse
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    org.mongodb.morphia.annotations.Index.unique
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    org.mongodb.morphia.annotations.Index.value
    use Index.fields()
